synopsis.text: Dali, a young protagonist, finds himself unsealed after a century of confinement. His unexpected meeting with Qingqing, a celestial nine-tailed fox hailing from another dimension, sets the stage for his journey. As he navigates through a world inhabited by extraordinary creatures and gifted individuals known as royal spirit masters, Dali's mission becomes threefold: to unravel the enigma surrounding his own existence, ascend to the position of the Chief Spiritual Master, and safeguard the world from unforeseen threats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
